ing: 1 tablespoon dark chocolate chips (such as GhirardelliÂ® 60% Dark Chocolate)
4 scoops softened vanilla bean ice cream, or more to taste
1/2 teaspoon peppermint extract, or to taste
1/2 cup skim milk, or as needed
des:
"You want some fries with that shake! Ha! Hey ya'll, thank y'all sooo much for your feed back on my dark chocolate granola and giving me 4.5 stars! 

I am a huge fan of Chick-Fil-AÂ®'s Seasonal Peppermint shake, so I decided, why not make my own at home! Saves me gas, time and money! I decided to keep it as simple as possible, and family friendly, so you can make it with the kids, nieces, nephews, baby cousins, or who else wants to help!  I hope y'all enjoy it, let me know! I'd love your feedback also! Pour into cup, grab a straw, and enjoy!"
ins: Blend ice cubes, peppermint candies, and chocolate chips together in a blender until evenly blended and slightly grainy. Add ice cream, peppermint extract, and red food coloring; blend until smooth. Add milk and blend until desired consistency is reached.
